summary: At a Catholic mission in China, long-awaited "Father O'Shea" proves to be a tough guy, disturbingly attractive to mission nurse Anne.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Gene Tierney|Lee J. Cobb|Agnes Moorehead|E.G. Marshall|Jean Porter|Carl Benton Reid|Victor Sen Yung|Philip Ahn|Benson Fong|Robert Burton|George Chan|Sophie Chin|Peter Chong|Doris Chung|Richard H. Cutting|Don Forbes|Candace Lee|George Lee|May Lee|Leon Lontoc|Stella Lynn|Maria McClay|Moy Ming|Henry S. Quan|Walter Soo Hoo|Kam Tong|Sammee Tong|Noel Toy|Beal Wong|Stephen Wong|Soo Yong
title: La mano izquierda de Dios
